00012 std::istream& ConvertData::ChOffsetLoader::operator()(std::istream& in)
00013 {
00014   int ch;
00015   double offset;
00016   in >> ch >> offset;
00017   _parent->SetChOffset(ch,offset);
00018   return in;
00019 }
00020 
00021 std::ostream& ConvertData::ChOffsetLoader::operator()(std::ostream& out)
00022 {
00023   std::map<int,double>* offsets = _parent->GetChOffsetMap();
00024   std::map<int,double>::iterator it = offsets->begin();
00025   for( ; it != offsets->end(); it++){
00026     out<<GetFuncName()<<" "<<it->first<<" "<<it->second<<std::endl;
00027   }
00028   return out;
00029 }

00031 ConvertData::ConvertData():
00032   BaseModule(GetDefaultName(), 
00033              "Convert the binary data to useable vectors and timestamps")
00034 {
00035   RegisterFunction(ChOffsetLoader::GetFuncName(), ChOffsetLoader(this),
00036                    ChOffsetLoader(this));
00037   _v172X_params = 0;
00038   _mc_params = 0;

00046 
00047 int ConvertData::Initialize()
00048 {
00049   start_time = 0;
00050   previous_event_time = 0;
00051   _id_mismatches = 0;
00052   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00053 
00054   //initialize stuff for decoding V172X events
00055   if(!_v172X_params) 
00056     _v172X_params = dynamic_cast<V172X_Params*>
00057       (config->GetParameter(V172X_Params().GetDefaultKey()));
00058     //if that didn't work, we need to load it
00059   bool err = 0;
00060   if(config->GetSavedCfgFile() != "")
00061     err = config->LoadCreateParameterList(_v172X_params);
00062   if(_v172X_params){
00063     Message(DEBUG)<<"Number of V172X boards in this run: "
00064                   <<_v172X_params->GetEnabledBoards()<<"\n";
00065     //make sure all the per-board params are set
00066     for(int i=0; i<_v172X_params->GetEnabledBoards(); i++){
00067       V172X_BoardParams& board = _v172X_params->board[i];
00068       board.UpdateBoardSpecificVariables();
00069     }
00070     //make sure some intermediate values are set
00071     _v172X_params->GetEventSize();
00072   }
00073   
00074   //Try to load Monte Carlo information
00075   //mc info only comes from saved config files
00076   if(config->GetSavedCfgFile() != "")
00077     err = config->LoadCreateParameterList(_mc_params);
00078   if(_mc_params){
00079     if(EventHandler::GetInstance()->GetRunID()==-1)
00080       EventHandler::GetInstance()->SetRunID(_mc_params->mch_run_number);
00081   }
00082   
00083   if(!_v172X_params && !_mc_params){
00084      Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to load saved configuration information!\n";
00085      return 1;
00086   }
00087   
00088   _info = EventHandler::GetInstance()->GetRunInfo();
00089   //Load campaign information
00090   _cpinfo = EventHandler::GetInstance()->GetCampaignInfo();
00091   
00092   return 0;
00093 }
00094 
00095 int ConvertData::Finalize()
00096 {   
00097   //reset the parameter lists
00098   _v172X_params = 0;
00099   _mc_params = 0;
00100   if(_id_mismatches){
00101     Message(WARNING)<<_id_mismatches<<" events had mismatched IDs!\n";
00102   }
00103   return 0;
00104 }
00105 
00106 const uint64_t ns_per_s = 1000000000;
00107 int ConvertData::Process(EventPtr event)
00108 {
00109   RawEventPtr raw = event->GetRawEvent();
00110   EventDataPtr data = event->GetEventData();
00111   
00112   //get basic info from the headers
00113   data->event_id = raw->GetID();
00114   data->timestamp = raw->GetTimestamp();
00115   if(start_time == 0){
00116     //this is the first event
00117     start_time = data->timestamp;
00118   }
00119   //set the most basic first, other decoders can override
00120   data->event_time = 1000000000*(data->timestamp-start_time);
00121   //get the real data from datablocks
00122   data->channels.clear();
00123   for(size_t blocknum=0; blocknum<raw->GetNumDataBlocks(); blocknum++){
00124     switch(raw->GetDataBlockType(blocknum)){
00125     case RawEvent::CAEN_V172X :
00126       DecodeV172XData(raw->GetRawDataBlock(blocknum), 
00127                       raw->GetDataBlockSize(blocknum), 
00128                       data);
00129       break;
00130     case RawEvent::MONTECARLO :
00131       DecodeMCData(raw->GetRawDataBlock(blocknum),
00132                    raw->GetDataBlockSize(blocknum),
00133                    data);
00134       break;
00135     default :
00136       Message(ERROR)<<"Decoding has not yet been implemented for block type "
00137                     <<raw->GetDataBlockType(blocknum)<<"\n";
00138       continue;
00139     }
00140   }
00141   
00142   if(!_headers_only){
00143     data->nchans = data->channels.size();
00144     //find the max and min of each channel
00145     for(int ch=0; ch<data->nchans; ch++)
00146       {
00147         ChannelData& chdata = data->channels[ch];
00148         double* wave = chdata.GetWaveform();
00149         double* max_samp = std::max_element(wave, wave+chdata.nsamps);
00150         double* min_samp = std::min_element(wave, wave+chdata.nsamps);
00151         //data is saturated if it hit 0 or maximum range
00152         chdata.saturated = (*min_samp == 0 || 
00153                             *max_samp == chdata.GetVerticalRange());
00154         if(chdata.saturated) data->saturated = true;
00155         chdata.maximum = *max_samp;
00156         chdata.minimum = *min_samp;
00157         chdata.max_time = chdata.SampleToTime(max_samp - wave);
00158         chdata.min_time = chdata.SampleToTime(min_samp - wave);
00159         //find the single photoelectron peak for this channel
00160         RunDB::runinfo::channelinfo* chinfo = 
00161           _info->GetChannelInfo(chdata.channel_id);
00162         if(chinfo)
00163           chdata.spe_mean = chinfo->spe_mean;
00164         else
00165           {
00166             chdata.spe_mean = 1;
00167             bool fail = EventHandler::GetInstance()->GetFailOnBadCal();
00168             if(fail){
00169               Message(ERROR)<<"No calibration info for channel "
00170                             <<chdata.channel_id<<" in event "
00171                             <<data->event_id<<" in run "<<data->run_id<<"\n";
00172               return -1;
00173             }
00174           }
00175 
00176         // get the PMT information for this channel
00177         chdata.pmt.Load(_cpinfo->pmts[chdata.channel_id]);
00178       }
00179     data->nchans = data->channels.size();
00180   }// end skipped section if headers only
00181 
00182   data->dt = ( previous_event_time > 0 ? 
00183                data->event_time - previous_event_time : 0 );
00184   previous_event_time = data->event_time;
00185   
00186   //since we don't know the last event, set info for each event
00187   _info->starttime = start_time;
00188   _info->endtime = data->timestamp;
00189   _info->events = data->event_id+1;
00190   
00191   if(_info->trigger_veto > 0){
00192     _info->livetime = 1.*data->event_time/ns_per_s - 
00193       _info->trigger_veto/1000. * (1.*_info->events);
00194     //should  the acquisition window be "live"????
00195   }
00196   else if(data->trigger_count)
00197     _info->livetime = 1.*_info->events / data->trigger_count * 
00198       data->event_time / ns_per_s;
00199   if(data->nchans > 0 && 
00200      (_info->pre_trigger_time_us < 0 || _info->post_trigger_time_us < 0) ){
00201     //WARNING: this assumes all channels have same acquisition times!!!!!
00202     ChannelData& ch = data->channels[0];
00203     _info->pre_trigger_time_us = -ch.SampleToTime(0);
00204     _info->post_trigger_time_us = ch.SampleToTime(ch.nsamps);
00206   }
00207   return 0;
00208 }
00209 
00210 int ConvertData::DecodeV172XData(const unsigned char* rawdata, 
00211                                   uint32_t datasize, 
00212                                   EventDataPtr data)
00213 {
00214   V172XEventPtr v172X(new V172X_Event(rawdata,
00215                                       datasize, 
00216                                       _v172X_params) );
00217   const V172X_Params* params = v172X->GetParameters(); 
00218   int n_boards = v172X->GetNBoards();
00219   //estimate the number of channels and reserve size in the vector
00220   int reserve_size = (params->enabled_channels > 0 ? params->enabled_channels :
00221                       n_boards * 10 );
00222   data->channels.reserve( reserve_size + 5);
00223   bool id_mismatch=false;
00224   for(int i=0; i<n_boards; i++){
00225     const V172X_BoardData& board_data = v172X->GetBoard(i);
00226     const V172X_BoardParams& board_params = 
00227         params->board[board_data.board_id];
00228     //check for ID mismatch
00229     if(i==0)
00230       data->trigger_count = board_data.event_counter;
00231     else if(board_data.event_counter != (uint32_t)data->trigger_count){
00232       id_mismatch = true;
00233     }
00234                                                          
00235     uint64_t s_since_start = data->timestamp - start_time;
00236     //if(s_since_start > 1) s_since_start--;
00237     if(board_data.timestamp * board_params.ns_per_clocktick <
00238        board_params.GetTimestampRange()/2)
00239       s_since_start+=board_params.GetTimestampRange()/ns_per_s/4;
00240     else
00241       s_since_start-=board_params.GetTimestampRange()/ns_per_s/4;
00242     uint64_t n_resets = (s_since_start * ns_per_s)/ 
00243       ( board_params.GetTimestampRange());
00244     /*uint64_t n_resets2 = ((s_since_start+2)*ns_per_s)/
00245       ( board_params.GetTimestampRange());
00246     if( n_resets2 > n_resets && 
00247         (board_params.ns_per_clocktick*board_data.timestamp)<2*ns_per_s  
00248         && s_since_start > 1 )
00249         n_resets++;*/
00250     data->event_time = board_params.GetTimestampRange() * n_resets + 
00251       board_params.ns_per_clocktick * board_data.timestamp;
00252     for(int j=0; j<board_data.nchans; j++){
00253       if(board_data.channel_start[j] == NULL)
00254         continue;
00255       int channel_id = board_data.nchans * board_data.board_id + j;
00256       if( _skip_channels.find(channel_id) != _skip_channels.end())
00257         continue;
00258       const V172X_ChannelParams& ch_params = board_params.channel[j];
00259       data->channels.push_back(ChannelData());
00260       ChannelData& chdata = data->channels.back();
00261       chdata.board_id = board_data.board_id;
00262       chdata.board_num = i;
00263       chdata.channel_num = j;
00264       chdata.channel_id = channel_id;
00265       chdata.label = ch_params.label;
00266       chdata.timestamp = board_data.timestamp * 10; //Fix this!
00267       chdata.sample_bits = board_params.sample_bits;
00268       chdata.sample_rate = board_params.GetSampleRate();
00269       chdata.trigger_index = board_params.GetTriggerIndex() - 
00270         (int)(GetChOffset(channel_id) * chdata.sample_rate);
00271       
00272       //copy over the actual waveform information
00273       if(_headers_only) continue;
00274       chdata.channel_start = (char*)(board_data.channel_start[j]);
00275       chdata.channel_end = (char*)(board_data.channel_end[j]);
00276       if(board_params.zs_type != ZLE){
00277         // copy the data as a double 
00278         if(chdata.sample_bits < 9)
00279           chdata.waveform.assign((uint8_t*)chdata.channel_start,
00280                                  (uint8_t*)chdata.channel_end);
00281         else if (chdata.sample_bits == 10) {
00282           chdata.waveform.clear ();
00283           for (uint32_t* ptr = (uint32_t*)chdata.channel_start; 
00284                ptr < (uint32_t*)chdata.channel_end; ptr ++) {
00285             uint32_t raw_v = *ptr;
00286             const int ns = (raw_v>>30)&3;
00287             for (int i = 0; i < ns; i++) {
00288               uint16_t sample = raw_v & 0x3ff;
00289               raw_v = raw_v >> 10;
00290               chdata.waveform.push_back (sample);
00291             }
00292           }
00293         }
00294         else if(chdata.sample_bits < 17)
00295           chdata.waveform.assign((uint16_t*)chdata.channel_start,
00296                                  (uint16_t*)chdata.channel_end);
00297         else
00298           chdata.waveform.assign((uint32_t*)chdata.channel_start,
00299                                  (uint32_t*)chdata.channel_end);
00300       }
00301       else{
00302         //we need to evaluate the zero skipped data
00303         //first word is the size of this channel's data
00304         uint32_t nwords = *((uint32_t*)(chdata.channel_start));
00305         chdata.nsamps = 0;
00306         uint32_t offset = 1;
00307         std::vector<const char*> data_blocks;
00308         while(offset < nwords){
00309           //get the control word
00310           uint32_t control = *( ((uint32_t*)(chdata.channel_start)) + offset);
00311           uint32_t subwords = control & 0x1FFFFF;
00312           uint32_t subsamps = subwords * board_params.bytes_per_sample;
00313           bool good = control & 0x80000000;
00314           
00315           if(good){
00316             data_blocks.push_back( chdata.channel_start + 4*(offset+1) );
00317             std::pair<int,int> region(chdata.nsamps,
00318                                       chdata.nsamps + subsamps);
00319             chdata.unsuppressed_regions.push_back(region);
00320             offset += subwords;
00321           }
00322           
00323           chdata.nsamps += subsamps;
00324           offset += 1;
00325         }
00326         //assign all the value of 1 by default so it doesn't show as saturated
00327         chdata.waveform.assign(chdata.nsamps, 1);
00328         std::vector<double>& wave = chdata.waveform;
00329         //now try to fill all the valid samples
00330         for(size_t block=0; block < data_blocks.size(); block++){
00331           int subsamps = chdata.unsuppressed_regions[block].second - 
00332               chdata.unsuppressed_regions[block].first;
00333           if(chdata.sample_bits < 9){
00334             std::copy( (uint8_t*)data_blocks[block],
00335                        ((uint8_t*)data_blocks[block]) + subsamps,
00336                        &(wave[chdata.unsuppressed_regions[block].first]) );
00337           }
00338           else if (chdata.sample_bits < 17){
00339             std::copy( (uint16_t*)data_blocks[block],
00340                        ((uint16_t*)data_blocks[block]) + subsamps,
00341                        &(wave[chdata.unsuppressed_regions[block].first]) );
00342           }
00343           else {
00344             std::copy( (uint32_t*)data_blocks[block],
00345                        ((uint32_t*)data_blocks[block]) + subsamps,
00346                        &(wave[chdata.unsuppressed_regions[block].first]) );
00347           }
00348         }
00349         //finally set the baseline to the nearest sample
00350         for(size_t block=0; block < data_blocks.size(); block++){
00351           std::pair<int,int> region = chdata.unsuppressed_regions[block];
00352           int fill_start = (block > 0 ? 
00353                             chdata.unsuppressed_regions[block-1].second : 0 );
00354           int fill_end = region.first;
00355           if(fill_end > fill_start)
00356             std::fill( &(wave[fill_start]), &(wave[fill_end]), wave[fill_end]);
00357         }
00358         //check the last region
00359         if( !chdata.unsuppressed_regions.empty() && 
00360             chdata.unsuppressed_regions.back().second < chdata.nsamps){
00361           std::fill( &(wave[chdata.unsuppressed_regions.back().second]),
00362                      &(wave[chdata.nsamps]), 
00363                      wave[chdata.unsuppressed_regions.back().second-1] );
00364         }
00365       }// end check for zero suppressed data
00366       chdata.nsamps = chdata.waveform.size();
00367     }
00368   }
00369   if(id_mismatch){
00370     if(_id_mismatches==0){
00371       Message(WARNING)<<"Event ID mismatch found on event "
00372                       <<data->event_id<<"!\n";
00373       Message(WARNING)<<"Further mismatches will be silent.\n";
00374     }
00375     
00376     data->status |= EventData::ID_MISMATCH;
00377     _id_mismatches++;
00378   }     
00379   
00380   return 0;
00381 }
00382 
00383 int ConvertData::DecodeMCData(const unsigned char* rawdata, 
00384                               uint32_t datasize, 
00385                               EventDataPtr data)
00386 {
00387   const unsigned sample_bits = 12;
00388   const unsigned bytes_per_samp = 2;
00389   //make sure the data size makes sense
00390   uint32_t chsize = _mc_params->mch_number_of_samples * bytes_per_samp;
00391   uint32_t config_datasize = _mc_params->mch_number_of_channels * chsize;
00392   if(datasize != config_datasize){
00393     Message(ERROR)<<"Mismatched Monte Carlo datasize! Expect "<<config_datasize
00394                   <<"; raw data reads "<<datasize<<"\n";
00395     return 1;
00396   }
00397   
00398   //copy over all events
00399   data->channels.resize(_mc_params->mch_number_of_channels);
00400   for(size_t ch=0; ch<data->channels.size(); ch++){
00401     ChannelData& chdata = data->channels[ch];
00402     chdata.channel_num = ch;
00403     chdata.channel_id = ch;
00404     chdata.sample_bits = sample_bits;
00405     chdata.sample_rate = 1000./(1.*_mc_params->mch_sampling_time);
00406     chdata.trigger_index = _mc_params->mch_trigger_delay;
00407     chdata.nsamps = _mc_params->mch_number_of_samples;
00408     chdata.channel_start = (char*)(rawdata + chsize*ch);
00409     chdata.channel_end = (char*)(chdata.channel_start + chsize);
00410     if(bytes_per_samp == 1)
00411       chdata.waveform.assign((uint8_t*)chdata.channel_start,
00412                              (uint8_t*)chdata.channel_end);
00413     else if(bytes_per_samp == 2)
00414       chdata.waveform.assign((uint16_t*)chdata.channel_start,
00415                              (uint16_t*)chdata.channel_end);
00416     else if(bytes_per_samp == 3 || bytes_per_samp == 4)
00417       chdata.waveform.assign((uint32_t*)chdata.channel_start,
00418                              (uint32_t*)chdata.channel_end);
00419     else
00420       chdata.waveform.assign((uint64_t*)chdata.channel_start,
00421                              (uint64_t*)chdata.channel_end);
00422   }//end loop over channels
00423   return 0;
00424     
00425 }
